column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I thought I'd seen the height of gastropubs and steakhouses... Bavette's proves that there are always more amazing things that Brendan Sodikoff and his gang can come up with. Fantastic ambiance
column5: and best of all - some of the best food I've ever had. The bone in ribeye was out of this world
column10: even the pomme frites were so tasty (cooked in pork fat. Of course)
